operator.title: Check BBB
operator.synopsis: Super Operator Template for Check BBB

text.paragraph: This is a super operator defined for Check BBB in ECG diagnosis, with pre-deined input ports and outpot ports.
The input Model port receives the step model. The output Yes and No ports are like the one in ECG_XAI Operators, indicating the result is satisfying the condition or not.

inputPorts.port: Input port for the step model. This operator will add its inner process to this step.

outputPorts.port: Output port for this operator, indicating the route where the result is satisfying the condition.
Output port for this operator, indicating the route where the result is not satisfying the condition.
